## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### New Stone Furnace at position (2, 2)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 2))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure your inventory is not full before attempting to insert items into furnaces. Manage your inventory to avoid being over the limit.

### Errors when crafting items due to missing materials
- Check your inventory for required materials before attempting to craft items. Ensure you have enough of the necessary sub-ingredients.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to do so. Check for any existing entities that may occupy the intended position.

### Errors related to fuel availability in furnaces
- Ensure that you have sufficient fuel available in your inventory before attempting to fuel furnaces. Harvest or craft fuel as needed before insertion.
